remarks: Express the condition of isomorphism on two strict orders for a function's restriction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jan-2015.)
statement:
soisores $p |- ( ( ( R Or B /\ S Or C ) /\ ( F : B --> C /\ A C_ B ) ) -> ( ( F |` A ) Isom R , S ( A , ( F " A ) ) <-> A. x e. A A. y e. A ( x R y -> ( F ` x ) S ( F ` y ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
